```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F)

library(dplyr)
library(DT)

incomparable_master_wide <- readRDS("../data/incomparable_master_wide.rds")
```

# List of episodes with missing metadata

Note on what I mean by "topic" and "category":
![](http://dump.jemu.name/MoVpb.png)

## Missing Category

```{r, echo=F}
incomparable_master_wide %>% 
  filter(category == "Not provided") %>%
  select(podcast, number, date, title, category, topic, host) %>%
  datatable(filter = "top", options = list(pageLength = 100, autoWidth = TRUE)) %>%
  formatDate(columns = "date", method = "toLocaleDateString")
```

## Missing Topic

Yes, I know it's not strictly mandatory, but just in case it was an oversight.

```{r, echo=F}
incomparable_master_wide %>% 
  filter(topic == "Not provided") %>%
  select(podcast, number, date, title, category, topic, host) %>%
  datatable(filter = "top", options = list(pageLength = 100, autoWidth = TRUE)) %>%
  formatDate(columns = "date", method = "toLocaleDateString")
```
